sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const StartScreen = ({ onStartGame }) => { const styles = { container: { width: '100vw', height: '100vh', position: 'relative', overflow: 'hidden', fontFamily: 'monospace', backgroundImage: 'url(/backgrounds/tileable-background-skyline.png)', backgroundSize: 'auto', backgroundPosition: 'center', backgroundRepeat: 'repeat-x' }, cityscape: { position: 'absolute', bottom: '30%', width: '100%', height: '40%', background: 'linear-gradient(to top, rgba(0,0,0,0.3) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.1) 50%, transparent 100%)', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-end', justifyContent: 'center' }, building: { width: '60px', height: '120px', backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.4)', margin: '0 5px', position: 'relative' }, tallBuilding: { width: '40px', height: '180px', backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.5)', margin: '0 3px' }, clouds: { position: 'absolute', width: '80px', height: '40px', backgroundColor: 'white', borderRadius: '40px', opacity: 0.9 }, title: { fontSize: '4rem', color: 'white', textShadow: '4px 4px 0px #000', marginBottom: '3rem', fontWeight: 'bold', letterSpacing: '4px', textAlign: 'center', zIndex: 10 }, character: { position: 'absolute', bottom: '30%', left: '20%', fontSize: '4rem', zIndex: 5 }, hearts: { position: 'absolute', fontSize: '2rem', color: '#ff4757', zIndex: 3 }, bamboo: { position: 'absolute', left: '5%', bottom: '30%', width: '20px', height: '200px', backgroundColor: '#228B22', borderRadius: '10px' }, flowers: { position: 'absolute', right: '10%', bottom: '35%', fontSize: '1.5rem' }, startButton: { fontSize: '1.8rem', padding: '15px 40px', backgroundColor: '#ff6b6b', color: 'white', border: '4px solid #fff', borderRadius: '0', cursor: 'pointer', fontFamily: 'monospace', fontWeight: 'bold', textShadow: '2px 2px 0px #000', boxShadow: '4px 4px 0px #000', transition: 'all 0.1s ease', zIndex: 10 }, ground: { position: 'absolute', bottom: 0, width: '100%', height: '30%', background: 'repeating-linear-gradient(90deg, #228B22 0px, #228B22 20px, #32CD32 20px, #32CD32 40px)', borderTop: '4px solid #000' } }; return (
{/* Start button */}
); }; export default StartScreen;
